About me

My name is Polina Filina

I'm a passionate and dedicated Front-end Developer based in Incheon, South Korea. I'm experienced in using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, React and Redux. I'm not just about the frontend ‚Äì I also have experience with backend technologies like WordPress, Express.js, PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
